author: Constant, Matthieu and Sigogne, Anthony and Watrin, Patrick
title: La reconnaissance des mots composés à l'épreuve de l'analyse syntaxique et vice-versa : évaluation de deux stratégies discriminantes (Recognition of Compound Words Tested against Parsing and Vice-versa : Evaluation of Two Discriminative Approaches) [in French]
booktitle: Proceedings of the Joint Conference JEP-TALN-RECITAL 2012, volume 2: TALN
